title: Steve Johnson-Making a Sub-Hilt Fighter 2 Discs
description:

 Steven R. Johnson
 
THIS IS A 2 DVD SET

image link
http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/41lUTojod3L._SL500_AA240_.jpg

Region: All Regions
Run Time: 228 minutes
ASIN: B001J0EKJC

Product Description
Learn how to make a sub-hilt fighter (knife) from scratch. 
Join Steve Johnson as he teaches you from beginning to end how to create and customize your own sub-hilt fighter. 
In this video you are taken step-by-step through the entire process from a piece of bar stock to a piece of art.
Pictorials are included to give you a feel for what you can accomplish. 
This two disc set includes almost four hours of valuable instructions. 
Steve includes tips on free hand grinding, soldering guards, machine polishing, and shows his methods for obtaining a beautiful fit and finish.

Comments:
The music is bloody annoying, and some safety practises leave mo doubt why he is missing fingers.  
Despite that, this is one of the best knifemaking videos outlining all processes.
